00055 static void initData(ModifierData *md) 
00056 {
00057     ClothModifierData *clmd = (ClothModifierData*) md;
00058     
00059     clmd->sim_parms = MEM_callocN(sizeof(ClothSimSettings), "cloth sim parms");
00060     clmd->coll_parms = MEM_callocN(sizeof(ClothCollSettings), "cloth coll parms");
00061     clmd->point_cache = BKE_ptcache_add(&clmd->ptcaches);
00062     
00063     /* check for alloc failing */
00064     if (!clmd->sim_parms || !clmd->coll_parms || !clmd->point_cache)
00065         return;
00066     
00067     cloth_init (clmd);
00068 }
00069 
00070 static void deformVerts(ModifierData *md, Object *ob, DerivedMesh *derivedData, float (*vertexCos)[3],
00071             int UNUSED(numVerts), int UNUSED(useRenderParams), int UNUSED(isFinalCalc))
00072 {
00073     DerivedMesh *dm;
00074     ClothModifierData *clmd = (ClothModifierData*) md;
00075     DerivedMesh *result=NULL;
00076     
00077     /* check for alloc failing */
00078     if (!clmd->sim_parms || !clmd->coll_parms) {
00079         initData(md);
00080 
00081         if (!clmd->sim_parms || !clmd->coll_parms)
00082             return;
00083     }
00084 
00085     dm = get_dm(ob, NULL, derivedData, NULL, 0);
00086     if (dm == derivedData)
00087         dm = CDDM_copy(dm);
00088 
00089     CDDM_apply_vert_coords(dm, vertexCos);
00090 
00091     DM_ensure_tessface(dm); /* BMESH - UNTIL MODIFIER IS UPDATED FOR MPoly */
00092 
00093     clothModifier_do(clmd, md->scene, ob, dm, vertexCos);
00094 
00095     if (result) {
00096         result->getVertCos(result, vertexCos);
00097         result->release(result);
00098     }
00099 
00100     dm->release(dm);
00101 }
00102 
00103 static void updateDepgraph(ModifierData *md, DagForest *forest, Scene *scene, Object *ob, DagNode *obNode)
00104 {
00105     ClothModifierData *clmd = (ClothModifierData*) md;
00106     
00107     Base *base;
00108     
00109     if (clmd) {
00110         for (base = scene->base.first; base; base= base->next) {
00111             Object *ob1= base->object;
00112             if (ob1 != ob) {
00113                 CollisionModifierData *coll_clmd = (CollisionModifierData *)modifiers_findByType(ob1, eModifierType_Collision);
00114                 if (coll_clmd) {
00115                     DagNode *curNode = dag_get_node(forest, ob1);
00116                     dag_add_relation(forest, curNode, obNode, DAG_RL_DATA_DATA|DAG_RL_OB_DATA, "Cloth Collision");
00117                 }
00118             }
00119         }
00120     }
00121 }

00123 static CustomDataMask requiredDataMask(Object *UNUSED(ob), ModifierData *md)
00124 {
00125     CustomDataMask dataMask = 0;
00126     ClothModifierData *clmd = (ClothModifierData*)md;
00127 
00128     if (cloth_uses_vgroup(clmd))
00129         dataMask |= CD_MASK_MDEFORMVERT;
00130 
00131     if (clmd->sim_parms->shapekey_rest != 0)
00132         dataMask |= CD_MASK_CLOTH_ORCO;
00133 
00134     return dataMask;
00135 }
00136 
00137 static void copyData(ModifierData *md, ModifierData *target)
00138 {
00139     ClothModifierData *clmd = (ClothModifierData*) md;
00140     ClothModifierData *tclmd = (ClothModifierData*) target;
00141 
00142     if (tclmd->sim_parms) {
00143         if (tclmd->sim_parms->effector_weights)
00144             MEM_freeN(tclmd->sim_parms->effector_weights);
00145         MEM_freeN(tclmd->sim_parms);
00146     }
00147 
00148     if (tclmd->coll_parms)
00149         MEM_freeN(tclmd->coll_parms);
00150     
00151     BKE_ptcache_free_list(&tclmd->ptcaches);
00152     tclmd->point_cache = NULL;
00153 
00154     tclmd->sim_parms = MEM_dupallocN(clmd->sim_parms);
00155     if (clmd->sim_parms->effector_weights)
00156         tclmd->sim_parms->effector_weights = MEM_dupallocN(clmd->sim_parms->effector_weights);
00157     tclmd->coll_parms = MEM_dupallocN(clmd->coll_parms);
00158     tclmd->point_cache = BKE_ptcache_copy_list(&tclmd->ptcaches, &clmd->ptcaches);
00159     tclmd->clothObject = NULL;
00160 }
00161 
00162 static int dependsOnTime(ModifierData *UNUSED(md))
00163 {
00164     return 1;
00165 }
00166 
00167 static void freeData(ModifierData *md)
00168 {
00169     ClothModifierData *clmd = (ClothModifierData*) md;
00170     
00171     if (clmd) {
00172         if (G.rt > 0)
00173             printf("clothModifier_freeData\n");
00174         
00175         cloth_free_modifier_extern (clmd);
00176         
00177         if (clmd->sim_parms) {
00178             if (clmd->sim_parms->effector_weights)
00179                 MEM_freeN(clmd->sim_parms->effector_weights);
00180             MEM_freeN(clmd->sim_parms);
00181         }
00182         if (clmd->coll_parms)
00183             MEM_freeN(clmd->coll_parms);    
00184         
00185         BKE_ptcache_free_list(&clmd->ptcaches);
00186         clmd->point_cache = NULL;
00187     }
00188 }
00189 
00190 static void foreachIDLink(ModifierData *md, Object *ob,
00191                        IDWalkFunc walk, void *userData)
00192 {
00193     ClothModifierData *clmd = (ClothModifierData*) md;
00194 
00195     if (clmd->coll_parms) {
00196         walk(userData, ob, (ID **)&clmd->coll_parms->group);
00197     }
00198 
00199     if (clmd->sim_parms && clmd->sim_parms->effector_weights) {
00200         walk(userData, ob, (ID **)&clmd->sim_parms->effector_weights->group);
00201     }
00202 }
